articles.title: Top Gainers and Losers today on 10 July, 2024: Asian Paints, SBI Life Insurance Company, Mahindra & Mahindra, Tata Steel among most active stocks; Check full list here | Stock Market News - Mint
articles.description: Top Gainers and Losers Today : The Sensex lost 426.87 points, or -0.53, to settle at 80351.64, while the Nifty lost 108.75 points, or -0.45, to close at 24433.2.
articles.content: Top Gainers and Losers Today : The Nifty closed at 24433.2, down by 0.45%. Throughout the day, the Nifty reached a high of 24461.05 and a low of 24141.8. The Sensex traded between 80481.36 and 79435.… [+3270 chars]
